note:
Pronounced "syncretic". I play & teach modular synth, & tinker with number theory, among other things. US-based. 
Pausing my 30yr software career to go to grad school for mathematics.

⚡️🎶 Electronic Music 
🎛 Eurorack
🧮 Math
 ♾🧠 AuDHD
 🐈🐈‍⬛ Cats  

BLM. Trans rights are human rights.
